content.text: I <highlight>enjoy swimming</highlight> in the ocean. I <highlight>love going</highlight> to the beach. But I <highlight>want to learn</highlight> surfing. content.question: Which verbs are followed by -ing? Which by 'to + verb'?
content.question_ru: После каких глаголов идёт -ing? После каких 'to + глагол'?

theory.title: Verbs Followed by Gerund or Infinitive

points.rule: Gerund (-ing): enjoy, love, like, hate, mind, suggest, avoid, finish, keep, consider
points.rule_ru: Герундий (-ing): enjoy, love, like, hate, mind, suggest, avoid, finish, keep, consider
points.example: I enjoy reading. She avoids eating meat.

points.rule: Infinitive (to + verb): want, need, decide, plan, hope, expect, offer, promise, agree, refuse
points.rule_ru: Инфинитив (to + verb): want, need, decide, plan, hope, expect, offer, promise, agree, refuse
points.example: I want to travel. She agreed to help.

points.rule: Both (same meaning): start, begin, continue, prefer
points.rule_ru: Оба (одинаковое значение): start, begin, continue, prefer
points.example: I started learning / to learn English.

points.rule: Both (different meaning): stop, remember, forget, try
points.rule_ru: Оба (разное значение): stop, remember, forget, try
points.example: Stop smoking (quit) vs Stop to smoke (pause to smoke)
I'm interested in learning. I'm good at cooking.

exercises.instruction: Complete with gerund (-ing) or infinitive (to + verb).

questions.explanation: start can take both with same meaning

questions.question: In which sentence did the person quit the habit?
questions.explanation: Stop + -ing = quit doing. Stop + to = pause in order to do

questions.sentence_a: I remembered to lock the door.
questions.question: In which sentence is the person thinking about a past action?
questions.explanation: Remember + -ing = recall past action. Remember + to = not forget to do

produce.instruction: Write about your habits, plans, and preferences using gerunds and infinitives.
produce.instruction_ru: Напиши о своих привычках, планах и предпочтениях, используя герундии и инфинитивы.
prompts: What do you enjoy doing in your free time?
What have you decided to do this year?
What do you avoid doing? Why?
What do you hope to achieve in the future?
produce.example: I really enjoy spending time outdoors. I love hiking and I don't mind walking for hours. I've decided to explore more national parks this year. I hope to visit at least five new places. I avoid going when it's too crowded because I prefer enjoying nature in peace. I've considered buying a better camera to take photos. My friend suggested trying camping, but I'm not sure. I want to learn more about wildlife. I expect to have many adventures this year!
criteria: Uses gerunds after appropriate verbs (enjoy, avoid, mind, etc.)
Uses infinitives after appropriate verbs (want, decide, hope, etc.)

input_flood.description: Read 5 texts with gerunds and infinitives.

texts.title: New Year's Resolutions
texts.content: This year, I've decided to make some changes. I want to exercise more. I enjoy running, so I plan to run three times a week. I've promised to eat healthier food. I avoid eating junk food now. I hope to lose 5 kilos. I've also started learning to play guitar. I don't mind practicing every day. I expect to improve quickly. I refuse to give up! What do you hope to achieve this year?

texts.title: Job Hunting
texts.content: I've been looking for a new job. I enjoy working in marketing, but I want to try something different. I've considered changing careers completely. My friend suggested trying the tech industry. I agreed to send some applications. I don't mind starting from scratch. I hope to find something soon. I avoid applying to companies with bad reviews. I've decided to improve my skills first. I've started taking online courses. I expect to be more competitive soon.

texts.title: Language Learning
texts.content: Learning a language requires patience. I enjoy practicing with native speakers. I don't mind making mistakes. I've decided to study Japanese. I want to visit Japan someday. I started watching Japanese shows to improve my listening. I avoid translating everything in my head. I hope to become fluent in three years. I've promised to study every day. I consider using apps helpful. I plan to take the JLPT exam. I refuse to give up even when it's hard!

texts.title: Travel Plans
texts.content: We've decided to travel to South America. I enjoy exploring new cultures. My partner prefers staying in hostels to save money. We plan to visit five countries. We hope to see Machu Picchu. I've started learning some Spanish phrases. I avoid going to tourist traps. We agreed to take a cooking class in Peru. I don't mind traveling by bus. We expect to have an amazing trip. We've promised to take lots of photos!

texts.title: Healthy Habits
texts.content: My doctor suggested making some changes. I need to exercise more. I enjoy swimming, so I've started going to the pool. I avoid eating too much salt. I don't mind cooking healthy meals. I've decided to stop drinking soda. I want to feel better. I hope to lower my blood pressure. I consider walking great exercise too. I've agreed to have checkups regularly. I refuse to ignore my health anymore. I expect to see improvements soon!
